column7: Consider possible security implications associated with Warehouse module.
Standard pseudo-random generators are not suitable for security/cryptographic purposes.
Using lxml to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace lxml with the equivalent defusedxml package.
Using lxml.html to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace lxml.html with the equivalent defusedxml package.
Consider possible security implications associated with pickle module.
Consider possible security implications associated with parse module.
Consider possible security implications associated with mktemp module.
Consider possible security implications associated with __version__ module.
